Testimonials.title: What People Say
Testimonials.subtitle: Hear from creators building with ContentCursor
Testimonials.heading: Loved by innovators
Testimonials.description: See how ContentCursor is changing the game for creators and developers
Testimonials.trustIndicator: Trusted by builders across the globe

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.content: ContentCursor transformed our production workflow. We went from manual Drive uploads to fully automated sync in record time. The YouTube integration is a life-saver.

items.name: Michael Chen
items.content: The architecture is incredibly clean. I was able to customize the service layer to fit our specific needs in just a few hours. The MongoDB/Prisma combo is lightning fast.

items.name: Emily Rodriguez
items.content: As a non-technical manager, the automated folder organization in Drive made it possible for us to scale our video team without the usual headache of manual file management.

changePlan.question: Can I upgrade anytime?
changePlan.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan instantly. Your automation limits will adjust immediately.

freeTrial.question: Is there a free trial?
freeTrial.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day trial of the Pro features so you can test the full automation power.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about ContentCursor automation.

q1.question: What is ContentCursor?
q1.answer: ContentCursor is a full-stack SaaS boilerplate designed for content automation. It links your creative assets (YouTube) with cloud storage (Google Drive) using a clean Next.js 15 architecture.

q2.question: How does Drive automation work?
q2.answer: Our Drive service automatically creates project folders, handles chunked file uploads, and organizes your media based on your YouTube metadata or custom project settings.
